[Master Spotter (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=726) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 228 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ranger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=9)

**Prerequisites**
[Ranger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=722); expert in Perception

</column>

---

Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.
name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
